description: Try our easy to follow Popcorn Snack Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Popcorn Snack Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup fruit & nut mix, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place dates in a food processor and pulse to make a rough paste. Add coconut oil and nut butter. Process until smooth.
Scrape date mixture into bowl. Add popcorn and fruit and nut mix. Mix with a wooden spoon until mixture binds.
Line a large tray with baking paper. Roll 2 tbs of mixture into balls and place on tray. Freeze for 30 minutes or until firm.
Transfer balls to a large snap-lock bag and store in the freezer for up to 2 weeks.
